name: Whac-a-bug!
description:
It's not a bug - it's pretty bold statement. But can you really quickly spot the difference between bugs and not-bugs?

Whac-a-bug is a game about crashing bugs & worms with your hammer. But be careful! There are other animals playing in your garden. They obviously are not bugs, so kindly please, don't smash them...

Team

Bartosz Kostrowiecki
Alicja Gołębiewska
Lucyna Mazurkiewicz
Bartosz Moniewski
Filip Dąbrowski

Credits

All programming stuff was done during this jam.

All 3D models, materials, shaders and VFX were made during the jam.

All music was created during the jam. 

All animal animations are created during the jam. Skeleton animation assets for human were taken from Mixamo, but mixed and blended in unique way.

Sounds are taken from publicly avaible free sources.

External assets credits

All sounds were taken from freesound.org
